.hand[scrawl needs approximately 130 lines of code]

---

.hand[the user doesn't need (or want!) that much code]
```{r, eval=FALSE}
# load the functions
source("scrawl_functions.R")

# set the parameters for the art
art <- list(seed = 17, n_paths = 800, n_steps = 100,
            sz_step = 20, sz_slip = 5, palette = "vik")

# ensure R is in an appropriate state
scrawl_setup(options = art) 

# make a pretty picture with a three-step pipe
scrawl_build(options = art) %>% 
  scrawl_plot(options = art) %>% 
  scrawl_save(options = art)
```


---

---

.hand[What I coded...]

```{r}
pony_greet <- function(name) {
  gre <- c("Hiya ", "You Rock ", "Hey ", "Yay! It's ")
  adj <- c("Sparkle-", "Rainbow-", "Flower-", "Dazzle-")
  exc <- c("!", "!!", "!!!!!!!!", " :-)", " <3")
  message <- str_c(
    sample(gre, 1), sample(adj, 1), name, sample(exc, 1)
  )
  return(message)
}
```



---

.hand[What you coded...]

```{r}
pony_say <- function(x) { 
  msg <- sample(x, size = 1)
  return(msg)
} 

pony_greet <- function(name) {
  gre <- c("Hiya ", "You Rock ", "Hey ", "Yay! It's ")
  adj <- c("Sparkle-", "Rainbow-", "Flower-", "Dazzle-")
  exc <- c("!", "!!", "!!!!!!!!", " :-)", " <3")
  msg <- str_c(
    pony_say(gre), pony_say(adj), name, pony_say(exc)
  )
  return(msg)
}
```


---

.hand[But what if the pony doesn't know your name?????]

```{r}
pony_say <- function(x) { 
  msg <- sample(x, size = 1)
  return(msg) 
} 

pony_greet <- function(name) { #<<
  gre <- c("Hiya ", "You Rock ", "Hey ", "Yay! It's ")
  adj <- c("Sparkle-", "Rainbow-", "Flower-", "Dazzle-")
  exc <- c("!", "!!", "!!!!!!!!", " :-)", " <3")
  msg <- str_c(
    pony_say(gre), pony_say(adj), name, pony_say(exc)
  )
  return(msg)
}
```




---

.hand[Ponies have a default word for an unknown human!]

```{r}
pony_say <- function(x) { 
  msg <- sample(x, size = 1)
  return(msg) 
} 

pony_greet <- function(name = "Hooman") { #<<
  gre <- c("Hiya ", "You Rock ", "Hey ", "Yay! It's ")
  adj <- c("Sparkle-", "Rainbow-", "Flower-", "Dazzle-")
  exc <- c("!", "!!", "!!!!!!!!", " :-)", " <3")
  msg <- str_c(
    pony_say(gre), pony_say(adj), name, pony_say(exc) 
  ) 
  return(msg)
}
```


---

.hand[Yay!]

```{r}
pony_greet()
```
